metadata.name: Kattakampal Pooram
metadata.description:
This is a Pooram(Utsav) festival in Kattakambal in the Thrissur district of Kerala. The festival ends on Pooram asterism in the Malayalam month of Medam (April-May). The major highlight of the festival is the Kali Darika Samvadham, Yudham (War) and Darika Vadham (killing of the demon Darika), and the Pooram pageantry. Hundred of people came from different places to attend the festival.

Photo By Manoop Chandran

Edition - 1 / 1

Year - 2019

Camera & Lens - Canon 1 DX MARK 2 , 24 - 70
